skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create unique, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use when users request building web components, pages, or applications. Generate creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create unique, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use when users request building web components, pages, or applications.
skill.author: DennisLiuCk

security_audit.summary: Static analysis detected 20 patterns including hash values, URLs, and high-entropy strings. All findings are false positives: SHA256 hashes were misidentified as weak crypto/encoded payloads; source_url was flagged as hardcoded URL (expected metadata); file content entropy was misinterpreted. This is a legitimate frontend design skill with no malicious intent.

low_findings.title: Hardcoded URL in metadata
low_findings.description: The source_url field contains a GitHub repository URL. This is expected metadata for a skill report and not a security risk.

content.value_statement: Building unique, visually compelling web interfaces is challenging and time-consuming. This skill guides the creation of production-quality frontend code with intentional aesthetic choices, avoiding generic AI-generated aesthetics and delivering polished, memorable designs.
actual_capabilities: Generates production-grade HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code
Creates unique visual designs with intentional aesthetic direction
Follows design principles for typography, color, and layout
Produces accessible and functional web interfaces
limitations: Does not generate backend code or server-side functionality
Cannot execute code or preview designs in real-time
Does not integrate with design tools like Figma or Sketch
Limited to frontend technologies specified in the request

use_cases.title: Build Custom Landing Pages
use_cases.description: Create visually striking landing pages with unique branding, animations, and layouts that stand out from generic templates.
use_cases.target_user: Marketing teams and founders needing unique web presence

use_cases.title: Design Interactive Web Components
use_cases.description: Develop polished UI components like navigation systems, cards, modals, and data displays with smooth interactions.

use_cases.title: Prototype Creative Concepts
use_cases.description: Transform abstract design concepts into working frontend code with bold aesthetic choices and attention to detail.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Component Request
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a [component name] for a [use case]. Make it visually compelling with a [specific aesthetic direction, e.g., minimalist, retro-futuristic, organic] style. Include smooth animations and hover states.
prompt_templates.scenario: Simple component creation with specific aesthetic direction

prompt_templates.title: Complete Page Design
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a complete [page type, e.g., landing page, dashboard, about page] with a coherent visual identity. Use [specific color palette or theme]. Include [list of sections/components needed]. The design should feel [mood descriptor, e.g., luxurious, playful, professional].
prompt_templates.scenario: Full page implementation with brand identity

prompt_templates.title: Interactive Feature
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an interactive [feature name] with animations triggered by [scroll, hover, click]. Use [specific animation style, e.g., staggered reveals, parallax, physics-based]. The interface should demonstrate [specific visual effect].

prompt_templates.title: Design System Component
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a [component name] following these specifications: [list design tokens, spacing rules, typography choices]. It must be accessible and responsive. Include [specific states needed like loading, error, success].

output_examples.input: Create a product card component for a luxury e-commerce site. Use an elegant, sophisticated aesthetic.
output_examples.output: A refined product card featuring sophisticated typography, subtle hover interactions, premium color scheme with accent tones, and smooth fade-in animations. The card includes product image with zoom effect, elegant price display, and subtle shadow transitions.

output_examples.input: Build a navigation header for a creative agency portfolio. Make it bold and memorable.
output_examples.output: A striking navigation header with asymmetric layout, custom geometric shapes, dramatic typography for the logo, and smooth scroll-triggered background transitions. Uses a bold color palette with high-contrast accents.

output_examples.input: Design a data dashboard component with interactive charts and status indicators.
output_examples.output: A clean, professional dashboard component featuring CSS-based data visualizations, smooth state transitions for status indicators, organized information hierarchy, and responsive grid layout for different screen sizes.

best_practices: Start by defining a clear aesthetic direction before coding. Choose one cohesive style and execute it precisely.
Use CSS custom properties for consistent theming and easy customization across your design.
Focus on high-impact moments like page load animations and scroll-triggered effects rather than scattered micro-interactions.
anti_patterns: Using generic AI-generated aesthetics like Inter font with purple gradient backgrounds and predictable layouts.
Failing to commit to a clear design direction, resulting in inconsistent or watered-down visual identity.
Overloading designs with effects that do not serve the user experience or support the aesthetic goal.

faq.question: What frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill works with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as well as React, Vue, and other modern frameworks. Specify your preferred technology in the request.

faq.question: How do I get unique designs instead of generic ones?
faq.answer: Provide specific aesthetic direction in your request such as art movements, time periods, or mood descriptors. The skill intentionally avoids common AI design patterns.

faq.question: Can this skill create responsive designs?
faq.answer: Yes. Include your responsive requirements in the request and the skill will generate mobile-first, responsive layouts.

faq.question: Does this skill handle accessibility?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill follows accessibility best practices including proper semantic HTML, ARIA labels, and keyboard navigation support.

faq.question: How do I customize the generated designs?
faq.answer: The code uses CSS custom properties for colors, spacing, and typography. Modify these variables to adapt the design to your brand.

faq.question: What animation libraries are supported?
faq.answer: For React projects, the skill can use Motion library. For other contexts, it prioritizes pure CSS solutions for better performance.
